name: Definitely Not Google Minesweeper
description:
Google has taken Minesweeper from us!

Welcome to the *first* iteration of Minesweeper for the web, Bing Minesweeper! My intern Richard stole the Bing corporation's code and UI when he transferred to Google. He unfortunately released his version first, but I'm here to show the truth!

Controls
  • Dig Squares - Left Click
  • Place Flag - Right Click
